column4: hi, where can I download a ffmpeg version with x264 support for Ubuntu?
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=360774
just install ffmpeg and you have all you need
ffmpeg from ubuntu hardy does not have x264 support
Uriah: ffmpeg -i movie.avi -s 320x240 -i sound.acc movie.mp4

you dont need massiveness for system drive, only data

any recommendation for ssd drives?

any really, go with a brand you trust
try to get a 64bit deb, or install 32bit libs
sudo apt-get install ia32-libs
then dpkg --force-architecture
